Title: Cinderella Liberty
Cast: James Caan, Marsha Mason, Kirk Calloway, Eli Wallach, Burt Young, Bruno Kirby, Allyn Ann McLerie, Dabney Coleman, Fred Sadoff, Allan Arbus, Jon Korkes, Don Calfa, Ted D'Arms, Sally Kirkland, Diane Schenker
Plot: A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost. A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost. Written by Dana Luke <danaluke@iname.com>
Keywords: sailor, father figure, breasts, two word title, billiards
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
Actors: James Caan, Marsha Mason, Kirk Calloway
Description: Directed by Mark Rydell.  With James Caan, Marsha Mason, Kirk Calloway, Eli Wallach. A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son during an extended liberty due to his service records being lost.
